# Queztl-Core Testing & Monitoring System - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a comprehensive testing and monitoring system with:
- Performance dashboard with real-time metrics
- Dynamic problem generation for training
- AI/ML-based adaptive learning
- WebSocket real-time updates

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, React, Recharts, TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Python FastAPI, WebSocket support
- **Database**: PostgreSQL for metrics, Redis for caching
- **Deployment**: Docker Compose

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all frontend code
- Follow Python type hints in backend
- Keep API responses JSON-serializable
- Use WebSocket for real-time updates
- Store all metrics in PostgreSQL
- Cache frequently accessed data in Redis

## Project Status
✅ Project fully set up and ready to use
✅ Backend API with FastAPI, WebSocket, and training engine
✅ Frontend dashboard with Next.js and real-time metrics
✅ Docker Compose configuration for easy deployment
✅ All dependencies installed
✅ Comprehensive documentation created

## Quick Start
Run `./start.sh` to start all services with Docker
